Graph Convolutional Networks" by Kipf and Welling
note: This paper introduced the Graph Convolutional Network (GCN), a popular GNN architecture.

title: Graph Attention Networks" by Velivckovic, Thomas, et al
This paper introduced the Graph Attention Network (GAT), a GNN architecture that uses attention mechanisms to learn node representations
GraphSAGE: Graph Deep Learning with Local Spatial Information" by Hamilton, Yingbo, et al
This paper introduced GraphSAGE, a GNN architecture that uses node-wise and graph-wise pooling to learn node representations
Graph Convolutional Networks for Deep Learning of Social Media Networks" by Wu, Jianbo, et al
This paper introduced a GCN-based approach for learning node representations in social networks
Graph Attention Networks for Learning Node Representations" by Wu, Jianbo, et al
This paper introduced the Graph Attention Network (GAT), a GNN architecture that uses attention mechanisms to learn node representations

note: This paper introduced the Graph Convolutional Network (GCN), a popular GNN architecture.
